## Sequence anomaly

The ITPR3 structures differ from the Uniprot sequence in the residues 1406-1595.

Given

```python
import pymol2
from Bio.SeqUtils import seq1

with pymol2.PyMOL() as pymol:
    pymol.cmd.load('6DRC.cif')
    seqdex = {}
    for atom in pymol.cmd.get_model('name CA and chain A').atom:
        seqdex[int(atom.resi)] = seq1(atom.resn)
pdb_seq = ''.join([seqdex[i] if i in seqdex else 'X' for i in range(1, max(seqdex.keys())+1)])
```

And aligning it:

```python
a = align(ungap(al_seqs['itpr3_human']), pdb_seq)
show_alignment(a)
```
<div style="font-family:monospace; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;">-----RAILLPMDLDAHISSMLSS------GASCAAAAQRNASSYKATT-------RAFPRVTPTANQ----------------------------------------<br>****...........................................................................*****...........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................********************************.................................................................................................................................................................................*****.............................................................................................................................................***************.............................................................................................................................................................................................................******************************************************************............................................*****************..................***........................................................................................***********************************..................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................************************************.....................********************************.......................*****...................******...................*******............*********************************................................................................................................................*******************........................................................................................**********************************************************................................................................................................................................................................................*****...............................************************************...................................................................................................................************......................*******................................................................................................................................................*********************************************...................................................................................................................................................................************************************************************<br>--------------------------XXXXXXXXXXADPTLEKYVLSVVLDTINAFF--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br>  Score=2160.3</div>

Specifically:

```python
# Note the crystal structure lacks the last 60 amino acids, hence the odd maths
a = align(ungap(al_seqs['itpr3_human'])[1406:-1076], pdb_seq[1406:-1076+60])
show_alignment(a)
```

<div style="font-family:monospace; display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap;">TEVKMAYVNFVNHCYVDTEVEMKEIYTSNHIWTLFENFTLDMARVCSKREKRVADPTLEKYVLSVVLDTINAFFSSPFSENSTSLQTHQTIVVQLLQSTTRLLECPWLQQQHKGSVEACIRTLAMVAKG-----RAILLPMDLDAHISSMLSS------GASCAAAAQRNASSYKATT-------RAFPRVTPTANQ---------------------------------WDYKNIIEKL<br>.................************************************.....................********************************.......................*****...................******...................*******............*********************************..........<br>TEVKMAYVNFVNHCYVD--------------------------XXXXXXXXXXADPTLEKYVLSVVLDTINAFF-------------------------XXXXXXXWLQQQHKGSVEACIRTLAMVAKGXXXXXRAILLPMDLDAHISSMLSSXXXXXXGASCAAAAQRNASSYKATTXXXXXXXRAFPRVTPTANQXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXWDYKNIIEKL<br>  Score=105.4</div>

## Isoform

Do note that ITPR1 isoform 4 in NCBI is the Uniprot canonical.
